featured.text: Stretch limousines were hired to drive the prom-goers to expensive restaurants or discos for an all-night extravaganza.
Prom-goers were well dressed but not fancily dressed up for the occasion: boys wore jackets and ties and girls their Sunday dresses.
What is the main idea of the third paragraph? (A) Proper social behavior must be observed by prom-goers.

definition.zh_def: 經常參加某種活動的人，尤其是指經常參加某種娛樂或社交活動的人。
definition.en_def: A person who frequently attends a particular event or activity.
definition.example: She is a regular goer to the local theater.
